name: team-ice-breaker-app
description: A team ice breaker questions app with admin controls

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.deploy:patch: npm run version:patch && git add . && git commit -m "feat: release version $(node -p require('./package.json').version)" && git push
scripts.deploy:minor: npm run version:minor && git add . && git commit -m "feat: minor release version $(node -p require('./package.json').version)" && git push
scripts.deploy:major: npm run version:major && git add . && git commit -m "feat: major release version $(node -p require('./package.json').version)" && git push
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run docker:build-only
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run docker:push && git add . && git commit -m "feat: release version $(node -p require('./package.json').version)" && git push
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run docker:push && git add . && git commit -m "feat: minor release version $(node -p require('./package.json').version)" && git push
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run docker:push && git add . && git commit -m "feat: major release version $(node -p require('./package.json').version)" && git push
